query: SELECT GREATEST( resource.created, ( SELECT COALESCE(created, TO_TIMESTAMP(0)) FROM container_registry_repository_manifest WHERE repository_id = $1 ORDER BY created DESC LIMIT 1 ), ( SELECT COALESCE(last_updated, TO_TIMESTAMP(0)) FROM container_registry_repository_tag WHERE repository_id = $1 ORDER BY created DESC LIMIT 1 ) ) as "last_updated!" FROM resource WHERE resource.id = $1;
